mapper.select:
SELECT count(*) FROM DOSIRAK
WHERE upper(DOSIRAK_NAME) like '%' || upper(#{txt_search}) || '%'
mapper.update: UPDATE DOSIRAK SET DOSIRAK_VIEWS = DOSIRAK_VIEWS + 1 WHERE DOSIRAK_POSTNUM = #{dosirak_postnum}
mapper.select: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY DOSIRAK_VIEWS DESC) AS BESTNUM,DOSIRAK_TITLE,MAINIMAGE,DOSIRAK_CONTENT,DOSIRAK_POSTNUM FROM (SELECT * FROM DOSIRAK ORDER BY DOSIRAK_VIEWS DESC) WHERE ROWNUM<=3
